thread.section_title: TheShowerSealShop.com Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of theshowersealshop.com | 4 of 227
thread.title: Mark

author: Mark
title: Mark
text:
Parcel force indicated that they would deliver at some point in a 12 hour window one day, they didn't but their tracking was abysmal - the item had been returned to depot at 4pm while it was shown as out for delivery two hours later. Poor, poor service, they still expected someone to be there all day the next day even though they did not say they would deliver. The packaging was damaged on arrival - difficult with a strong cardboard cylinder!
I wouldn't choose this company again unless they gave me a choice of delivery options, good company but terrible logistics!
